Sample.Title: RH RRE2 WT B vs QW119 B 5D 1

Channel.Source: QW119 RNA from LB broth at log phase
Channel.Organism: Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium
Channel.Characteristics: QW119 (also called qw117) is a igaA point mutation
Channel.Label: cy5

Channel.Source: wild type RNA from LB broth at log phase
Channel.Organism: Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium
Channel.Label: cy3

Sample.Data-Processing: Genepix Pro 4.0, normalized so that the mean of the ratio of medians of all the features was equal to one

Column.Name: VALUE
Column.Description: log of medians_ch1/ch2 (mean of the ratio of medians of all the features was equal to one)

Column.Name: Name
Column.Description: gene names or STM numbers if no names available

Column.Name: STM_NUUMBERS
Column.Description: STM numbers

Column.Name: X_LOCATION
Column.Description: X-coordinate of spot

Column.Name: Y_LOCATION
Column.Description: Y-coordinate of spot

Column.Name: DIAMETER
Column.Description: spot diameter

Column.Name: CH1_MEDIAN
Column.Description: Cy5 (635 nm) median of signals

Column.Name: CH1_MEAN
Column.Description: Cy5 (635 nm) mean of signals

Column.Name: CH1_SD
Column.Description: Cy5 (635 nm) standard deviation of signals

Column.Name: CH1_BKD_MEDIAN
Column.Description: Cy5 (635 nm) median of background

Column.Name: CH1_BKG_MEAN
Column.Description: Cy5 (635 nm) mean of background

Column.Name: CH1_BKG_SD
Column.Description: Cy5 (635 nm) standard deviation

Column.Name: CH1%>CH1_BKD+1SD
Column.Description: percent of Cy5 (635 nm) signal pixels over one standard deviation over background levels

Column.Name: CH1%>CH1_BKD+2SD
Column.Description: percent of Cy5 (635 nm) signal pixels over two standard deviation over background levels

Column.Name: CH1%_SAT
Column.Description: percent of saturated Cy5 (635 nm) signal pixels

Column.Name: CH2_MEDIAN
Column.Description: Cy3 (532 nm) median of signals

Column.Name: CH2_MEAN
Column.Description: Cy3 (532 nm) mean of signals

Column.Name: CH2_SD
Column.Description: Cy3 (532 nm) standard deviation of signals

Column.Name: CH2_BKD_MEDIAN
Column.Description: Cy3 (532 nm) median of background

Column.Name: CH2_BKG_MEAN
Column.Description: Cy3 (532 nm) mean of background

Column.Name: CH2_BKG_SD
Column.Description: Cy3 (532 nm) standard deviation

Column.Name: CH2%>CH2_BKD+1SD
Column.Description: percent of Cy3 (532 nm) signal pixels over one standard deviation over background levels

Column.Name: CH2%>CH2_BKD+2SD
Column.Description: percent of Cy3 (532 nm) signal pixels over two standard deviation over background levels

Column.Name: CH2%_SAT
Column.Description: percent of saturated Cy3 (532 nm) signal pixels

Column.Name: MEDIANS_CH1/CH2
Column.Description: Cy5/Ch3 background corrected ratio of median intensity value of the whole feature

Column.Name: MEANS_CH1/CH2
Column.Description: Cy5/Ch3 background corrected ratio of mean intensity value of the whole feature

Column.Name: MEDIAN_OF_RATIONS_CH1/CH2
Column.Description: median of the Cy5/Cy3 background corrected ratios of each pixel of the feature

Column.Name: MEAN_OF_RATIONS_CH1/CH2
Column.Description: mean of the Cy5/Cy3 background corrected ratios of each pixel of the feature

Column.Name: RATIOS_SD_CH1/CH2
Column.Description: standard deviation of the Cy5/Cy3 background corrected ratios of each pixel of the feature

Column.Name: REGRESSION_RATIO_CH1/CH2
Column.Description: slope of the least squarest best-fit regression line in a scatter plot of Cy5/Cy3 for each pixel

Column.Name: REGRESSION_RSQUARE_CH1/CH2
Column.Description: square of correlation coefficient of the least-squares regression fit, proportion of regression pixels that can be described by the regression fit

Column.Name: NUMBER_OF_PIXELS
Column.Description: number of pixels in the spot

Column.Name: NUMBER_OF_BKD_PIXELS
Column.Description: number of pixels that comprise the background for the spot

Column.Name: SUM_OF_MEDIANS
Column.Description: sum of background subtracted median pixel intensities of both wavelengths

Column.Name: SUM_OF_MEANS
Column.Description: sum of background subtracted mean pixel intensities of both wavelengths

Column.Name: LOG_RATIO_CH1/CH2
Column.Description: log2 of means_ch1/ch2

Column.Name: CH1_MEDIAN_BKGR_CORR
Column.Description: median pixel intensity of Cy5 (635nm) minus median background of the spot

Column.Name: CH2_MEDIAN_BKGR_CORR
Column.Description: median pixel intensity of Cy3 (532nm) minus median background of the spot

Column.Name: CH1_MEAN_BKGR_CORR
Column.Description: mean pixel intensity of Cy5 (635nm) minus mean background of the spot

Column.Name: CH2_MEAN_BKGR_CORR
Column.Description: mean pixel intensity of Cy3 (532nm) minus mean background of the spot

Column.Name: CH1_INTENSITY
Column.Description: total Cy5 (635nm) intensity of all pixels of the spot

Column.Name: CH2_INTENSITY
Column.Description: total Cy3 (532nm) intensity of all pixels of the spot

Column.Name: CH1_SIGNAL_NOISE
Column.Description: Cy5 (635nm) signal/noise ratio

Column.Name: CH2_SIGNAL_NOISE
Column.Description: Cy3 (532nm) signal/noise ratio

Column.Name: FLAGS
Column.Description: feature quality assessment

Series.Title: Salmonella typhimurium igaA(T191P) and related
Series.Summary:
We have exploited a spontaneously isolated mutant IgaA(T191P) that is near-maximally activated for the Rcs system, to identify a vast set of genes that respond, and report new regulatory properties of this signaling system in Salmonella enterica serovar Typhimurium. Microarray data show that the Rcs system normally functions as a positive regulator of SPI-2 and other genes important for growth of Salmonella in macrophages, although when highly activated, the system completely represses the SPI-1/SPI-2 virulence, flagellar, and fimbrial biogenesis pathways. The auxilliary protein RcsA, which works with RcsB to positively regulate colanic acid and other target genes, not only stimulates but also antagonizes the positive regulation of many genes in the igaA mutant. We show that RcsB represses motility through the 'RcsB box' in the promoter region of the master operon flhDC, and that RcsA is not required for this regulation. Curiously, RcsB selectively stimulates expression of the flagellar Type 3 secretion genes fliPQR; an RcsAB box located downstream of fliR influences this regulation. We show that excess colanic acid impairs swimming and inhibits swarming motility, consistent with the inverse regulation of the two pathways by the Rcs system.
The work was published in Journal of Bacteriology:
Wang Q, Zhao Y, McClelland M, Harshey RM. The RcsCDB signaling system and swarming motility in Salmonella enterica serovar Typhimurium: dual regulation of flagellar and SPI-2 virulence genes. J Bacteriol. 2007 Sep 28; [Epub ahead of print] PMID: 17905992 [PubMed - as supplied by publisher] Keywords: Comparative genomic hybridization
Series.Overall-Design: Microarray was used to reveal the gene expression profiles in igaA(T191P) and related strains at two growth stages (log and stationary phases). Quantitative RT-PCR was used for detail studies.
